moves.1. e4: Hi everyone!!  Here is a shorty but goodie.  This game demonstrates an uncommon, yet devastating opening trap.  Black allows White to sac a piece for very rapid development and an early attack.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3: I always aim for the Ruy Lopez.
moves.2... f6: Don't EVER play this move!!  It leads to a terrific game for white, if not an early mate.
moves.5. Qxe5+ Kf7 6. Bc4+: Rapid development with tempo is always a good thing
moves.6... d5 7. Bxd5+ Kg6: getting the King out of his hole
moves.8. h4: If I can open the h file, the game is over VERY quick
moves.8... Nd7: Here, I think Black should have tried h6 to give the K some room
moves.13. Qf7#: And that's all she wrote.  quick game from an opening trap!!
